agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. James B. Frank The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. *Public testimony will be limited to three (3) minutes.* HB 320 King, Ken Relating to the drug testing of certain persons seeking benefits under the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program. HB 323 Johnson, Jarvis Relating to an exemption for a foster child from the payment of a fee for the issuance of a personal identification certificate. HB 759 Wu Relating to the availability of personal information of a child protective services caseworker or investigator. HB 1218 Klick Relating to the distribution of benefits under the supplemental nutrition assistance program. HB 1483 Frank Relating to a pilot program for assisting certain recipients of public benefits to gain permanent self-sufficiency. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
